description: The Essex Kent Mennonite Historical Society (EKMHA) preserves and promotes the history of Mennonites in Essex and Kent Counties, Ontario. Based at the Mennonite Heritage Centre (31 Pickwick Drive, Leamington), it offers museum exhibits, archival collections, and educational programs that trace Mennonite heritage from 16th-century European settlements to modern communities.
Photo by Andrea_44 on Wikimedia Commons, licensed under CC BY 2.0.
